message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate it. I am willing to pay $90 for it.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I understand your perspective, Alice. Considering the value I believe I should pay, I would like to offer $100 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $110 is the minimum I can go. It's still a great deal for you, considering the value the product will bring.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I believe we're getting closer. I would like to propose $105 for the product.

I think we're really close now, Bob. I'm willing to make one last adjustment to meet your budget. I can sell the product to you for $112.50. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
